data.title: Who is Spencer Paysinger's wife? Everything you need to know
data.meta_description: Spencer Paysinger's wife is Blair Duckworth-Paysinger. She is a designer and businesswoman. Find out more about her children, family, career, and husband here.
data.text:
In 2018, Spencer Paysinger’s life and career inspired the creation of the sports drama TV series All American. He became the consulting producer in the show and even had a small role as an assistant football coach for a high school team. Generally, everything about his life is somewhat featured in the show. However, the series has confused fans regarding the identity of his wife in the show, especially the character’s relationship with Olivia and closeness to Asher. But who is Spencer Paysinger’s wife in real life?

Spencer Paysinger’s wife is Blair Duckworth-Paysinger. She is an American graphic designer and business owner who owns the successful e-commerce store Post 21.

Her husband is a former NFL player who played as a linebacker for the New York Giants, Miami Dolphins, New York Jets, and Carolina Panthers. Furthermore, Spencer is an actor who has appeared in All American (2018) as Assistant Coach Baker.

Blair Duckworth-Paysinger profile summary

Full nameBlair Bordenave DuckworthGenderFemaleDate of birth10 August 1989Age33 (as of 2022)Zodiac signLeoPlace of birthLos Angeles, California, United StatesCurrent residenceView Park-Windsor Hills, Los Angeles, United StatesNationalityAmericanEthnicityMultiracialReligionChristianitySexualityStraightHair colourDark BrownEye colourBrownMotherJuana WilliamsFatherBilly DuckworthSiblingsAlex DuckworthMarital statusMarriedPartnerSpencer PaysingerChildren2 (Cairo Paysinger and Madden Paysinger)SchoolBeverly Hills High SchoolUniversityAcademy of Arts UniversityProfessionDesigner, businesswomanInstagram@blairpysngr

Early life

Blair was born Blair Bordenave Duckworth on 10 August 1989 (age 33 as of 2022) in Los Angeles, California, United States. She is the daughter of Juana Williams (mother) and Billy Duckworth (father). Furthermore, she has a brother named Alex Duckworth.

Blair Duckworth-Paysinger’s father worked as a coach for Beverly Eagles, the football team for Beverly Hills High School. On the other hand, Blair’s mother, Juana Williams, is a co-founder and co-owner of the e-commerce store Post 21. Juana Williams co-owns the store with her daughter Blair.

Blair Duckworth-Paysinger’s brother, Alex Duckworth, is a lifestyle and fashion photographer. He also has experience in videography and editing, specialising in digital content.

Blair Duckworth-Paysinger grew up in Los Angeles, California. She attended Beverly Hills High School, a public high school in Beverly Hills, California, where she graduated in 2006.

After her high school education, Blair enrolled at the Academy of Art University, a private learning institution of Art and Design in San Francisco, California, in 2007. She graduated from the institution in 2012 after majoring in advertising with a focus on art direction.

Professional career

When Blair Duckworth-Paysinger was still in college, she did several jobs as an intern. Her first internship was at Citizen Group, a creative, marketing, and social impact agency dedicated to building citizen brands. However, she only interned on social media and advertising projects for five months in 2010.

The same year, she went to work for Allsaints US, an online clothing store, as a sales representative. However, Blair only worked for the company for one year before leaving in 2011. In 2013, she joined Alternative Apparel as a design intern. However, she left the establishment in 2014. Blair Duckworth-Paysinger’s work history between 2014 and 2019 is undetermined.

In 2019, she co-founded a company with her mother called Post 21. It is an online e-commerce store that offers art, stationery, self-care items, books, jewellery, pet and items. As of 2022, Blair is the Chief Executive Officer of the company.

Husband and children

Blair Duckworth-Paysinger is married and has two children. Her two children are daughter Cairo Paysinger and Madden Paysinger, and her husband is Spencer Paysinger. He is an American former NFL player, actor, and producer. He was born Spencer Colin Christopher Paysinger on 28 June 1988 (age 34 as of 2022) in Crenshaw, California, United States.

Paysinger played as a linebacker in the NFL for many teams, including the New York Giants, Miami Dolphins, New York Jets, and Carolina Panthers. In 2018, he became a consultant, actor, and co-producer of the TV series All American, whose plot is based on his life and career.

Blair Duckworth-Paysinger met Spencer when they were in high school. They studied at Beverly Hills High School and graduated in the early 2000s. Even when the two went to college, they stayed in touch and soon started dating.

Several years after their first meet, Blair and Spencer welcomed their two children, Cairo (born in 2017) and Madden. Finally, on 28 May 2016, the duo exchanged marriage vows at the La Quinta Resort and Club in California.

Duckworth-Paysinger and her family live in the View Park-Windsor Hills area of Los Angeles, California.

Spencer Paysinger's wife net worth and house

Blair has worked as a designer since leaving college. However, she became an investor and a business owner who runs the online e-commerce store Post 21. Thus, she has made money through salaries, investments, and revenues from her business. But as of 2022, Blair Duckworth-Paysinger’s net worth is estimated to be over $350,000.

In 2015, Blair and Spencer Paysinger bought a house in the View Park-Windsor Hills area of Los Angeles, California, for $895,000. The house features a living room with a fireplace, four bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, and an interior that measures 2,600 square feet.

Blair Duckworth-Paysinger fast facts

Who is Spencer Paysinger’s wife? Spencer Paysinger’s wife is Blair Duckworth-Paysinger.

Is Spencer Paysinger’s wife in All American? No, Spencer Paysinger’s wife is not in All American.

Is Olivia in All American based on Blair Duckworth-Paysinger’s life? While the TV series is based on Spencer Paysinger’s life, it is unknown whether the character Olivia is also based on Blair Duckworth’s life.

How old is Blair Duckworth-Paysinger? Blair Duckworth-Paysinger is 33 as of 2022. She was born on 10 August 1989.

How did Spencer Paysinger meet his wife? Spencer Paysinger met his wife while in high school at Beverly Hills High School.

Where does Blair Duckworth-Paysinger live? Blair Duckworth-Paysinger lives with her family around the View Park-Windsor Hills area of Los Angeles, California.

Which team drafted Spencer Paysinger in the NFL? Spencer Paysinger was not drafted by any NFL team when he started playing in 2011.

What investments do the Paysingers have? Blair and Spencer Paysinger have invested in many businesses, including Post 21, Afterball LLC, and Hilltop Coffee + Kitchen.

So, who is Spencer Paysinger’s wife? His wife is Blair Duckworth-Paysinger. She is an American graphic designer and business owner who also created the online store Post 21. Blair and Spencer met while in high school and married in 2016. The couple has two children, Cairo Paysinger and Madden Paysinger, and owns a house in the View Park-Windsor Hills of Los Angeles, United States.

Tuko.co.ke shared an article about Jonathan Nelson. Jonathan Nelson is one of those gospel musicians who have mastered this art, and he is making it big in the contemporary gospel music sector. Through his songs, many souls have come closer to God and turned their lives around for the better.

Heis a minister, gospel singer, songwriter and producer from Baltimore, Maryland, United States. Some of his popular hits are I Believe, How Great is Our God, Praise is my Weapon, and My name is Victory. Additionally, he is the director of worship and arts at New Birth Missionary Baptist Church in Atlanta.
